EmailTemplate.name: Software Evergreen Service.12-dd-21 BNK SES P2 Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch! How to maximize your ATM spend and improve customer experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ATM resources are stretched. You’re trying to do more with less and continue to innovate to stand out in a competitive marketplace. The pressure to maintain daily ATM operations while predicting and developing future-proof solutions is relentless. So how can you make the best use of your IT budget and still deliver the wide range of services you need to? Watch our latest webinar to find out. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
